Question
========

When is a type II error? 
Answerlist
----------
* If H0 is rejected, while H0 is TRUE.
* If H0 is not rejected, while H0 is TRUE.
* If H0 is rejected, while H0 is not true.
* If H0 is not rejected, while H0 is not true.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
